text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Concealment" means hiding, secreting, or keeping out of sight.
"Fugitive" means an individual for whom a felony arrest warrant has been issued and is outstanding.

section.section: "Harbor" does not include failing to reveal the whereabouts of a fugitive or an escaped inmate by a person who did not participate in the effort of the fugitive or escaped inmate to elude arrest.

text.section: "Hardware secure facility" means a facility that is securely locked or fenced to prevent escape.

section.section:
"Place of confinement" means:
a correctional facility;
a facility of the Department of Health and Mental Hygiene; or
any other facility in which a person is confined under color of law.
